#The function amp_alphadiv works fine
```{r}
library(pkgdownissue720)
library(repmis)
repmis::source_data("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/madsalbertsen/ampvis2/master/data/AalborgWWTPs.rda", cache = FALSE)
test <- amp_alphadiv(AalborgWWTPs)
```
